Performance:
February 1979: The Love Suicide of Tokubei and Ofusa

Production: February 1979

Play: The Love Suicide of Tokubei and Ofusa (心中重井筒)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

The Kasaneizutsu Tea House (六軒町 / Rokkenchō)

Characters:

Ofusa (Kasaneizutsu no Ofusa / 重井筒のお房)

Sayo (Kasaneizutsu no Sayo / 重井筒の小夜)

Koroku (Kasaneizutsu no Koroku / 重井筒の小六)

Cook (Ryōrinin / 料理人)

Courier (Hikyakuya / 飛脚屋)

Wife of the Kasaneizutsu proprietor (Kasaneizutsu no naigi / 重井筒の内儀)

Apprentice (Decchi / 丁稚)

Tokubei (Kōya Tokubei / 紺屋徳兵衛)

Proprietor of the Kasaneizutsu tea house (Tokubei's brother) (Kasaneizutsu no teishu / 重井筒の亭主(徳兵衛の兄 ))
